title: Unelectable
author: VD
content_html:
Ron Paul beats Giuliani and McCain:

Final results of Thursday’s Illinois straw poll:

1. Mitt Romney – 40.35%

2. Fred Thompson – 19.96%

3. Ron Paul – 18.87%

4. Rudy Giuliani – 11.61%

5. John McCain – 4.12%
content_text:
Ron Paul
beats Giuliani and McCain
:
Final results of Thursday’s Illinois straw poll:
1. Mitt Romney – 40.35%
2. Fred Thompson – 19.96%
3. Ron Paul – 18.87%
4. Rudy Giuliani – 11.61%
5. John McCain – 4.12%
